new.title: New Project
new.subtitle: Configure a new voice capture project
new.cardDescription: Fill in the details to create your Voice Capture project
new.name: Project name
new.realtimeDescription: Automatic transcription immediately upon receiving each recording
new.snippetInstruction: Follow these 2 steps to integrate Voice Capture in your Alchemer survey
new.headSnippetInstruction: In Alchemer: Style > HTML/CSS Editor > Custom HEAD

snippetSteps.note: Change QUESTION_ID = 'q1' for each question (q1, q2, q3...). Add a separate JavaScript action for each question where you need voice capture. The widget will appear with a recording button and the transcription will be automatically written to the question's answer field.

detail.noRecordingsHint: Integrate the widget into your survey to start capturing voice recordings.

batch.title: Batch Transcription
batch.subtitle: Upload a CSV file or paste a list of Session IDs to transcribe in batch
batch.dragDrop: Drag a CSV file here or click to select
batch.pasteLabel: Paste Session IDs (one per line or comma-separated)
batch.enterSessionIds: Enter at least one Session ID
batch.summarySubtitle: Review the analysis before confirming transcription
batch.pollErrorMessage: Lost connection to the server. Check the batch status manually.

export.title: Export data
export.subtitle: Download recordings and transcriptions in CSV format

recordings.title: Recordings
recordings.subtitle: All recordings from your projects
recordings.noRecordingsYet: You don't have any recordings in any project yet

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account preferences
settings.comingSoon: Configuration options will be available soon.
